title: Viktor ap is one of the best things I ever seen in my life of playing league of legends
body: i dont know why people play him in top tank with klepto, he has really, and i mean, REALLY REALLY GOOD scalings on ap, i played with viktor today and he wasnt even fed, but he could win teamfights just by pressing e and r correctly and dealing tons of fuking damage, why isn't this a common thing to see? like, vik mid with electrocute or aery full ap ?  im not talking about low-elo, im actually at p1-d3 mmr
